message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn to be reasonable, Alice. This is a good deal before inflation eats into things further.
I can meet you in the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. I'm taking another hit from inflation, meet me halfway before it's too late for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think my share should be higher.
